Text:
it's amazing how huge a mistake it has been for some countries to dub their media rather than subtitle it like for instance Denmark, Norway and Sweden has done. as a result we rule at english and the germans, french, italians, and spanish suck at it. not to mention we suffer under their suckyness when they share their perverted movies :)
stop destroying video with your dubbing. write your governments, kidnap if you have to but get it stopped.
